程序包 tigateway.modbus.rtu

类 ModbusRTU

  • java.lang.Object
    • tigateway.modbus.protocol.ModbusPdu
      • tigateway.modbus.Modbus
        • tigateway.modbus.rtu.ModbusRTU
  • public class ModbusRTU
extends tigateway.modbus.Modbus
    MODBUS RTU driver for TiJOS based on https://github.com/sp20/modbus-mini
    作者:
    TiJOS

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 tigateway.modbus.Modbus

        RESULT_BAD_RESPONSE, RESULT_EXCEPTION, RESULT_OK, RESULT_TIMEOUT

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      ModbusRTU​(tigateway.serialport.TiSerialPort serialPort)
      Initialize with serial port and default time out (2000ms) and pause 5ms after write
      ModbusRTU​(tigateway.serialport.TiSerialPort serialPort, int timeout)
      Initialize modbus client with serial port

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ModbusRTU

        public ModbusRTU​(tigateway.serialport.TiSerialPort serialPort)
        Initialize with serial port and default time out (2000ms) and pause 5ms after write
        参数:
        serialPort - serial port

      • ModbusRTU

        public ModbusRTU​(tigateway.serialport.TiSerialPort serialPort,
                 int timeout)
        Initialize modbus client with serial port
        参数:
        serialPort - serila port
        timeout - read timeout
        pause - pause after send data
